column5: Hi Everyone,  I just wanted to wish all those who are celebrating the Chinese Mid Autumn festival tonight a Happy Mid-Autumn Festival!  For those who don't know this is the second biggest date of the year after Chinese New Year. It's like Thanksgiving here in North America.  The moon will usually be the largest and most colourful of the year (like an egg yolk). Good for fishing too!!!!  Have a Safe and Happy one!!  Stan
